title: N8N course
learningObjectives: Learn how to design and implement workflows in N8N
Master conditional controls and error handling in N8N
Understand how to integrate with external APIs and services in N8N
Learn best practices for N8N workflow design and maintenance

finalProjectDetails.overview: Design and implement a complete workflow in N8N that integrates with an external API
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit a written report outlining the use case, workflow design, and implementation details, along with the exported N8N workflow file.
